title: If you got a Snowdown Shop you weren't happy with. Are you able to reroll?
body:
I was told the last time the Your Shop came up that you were able to re-roll if you contacted Riot.

How am I able to do that?

replies.body: Nope, there's no rerolling for Your Shop currently.  The system does its best to get you champions or roles it thinks you may like, but there's no guarantee for any specific ones.  If you have any feedback, though, definitely share it with the devs on the [client boards](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/alpha-client-discussion)!
